CHOCOLATE: A food made from ground roasted cocoa beans.
GUMDROP: A small chewy candy made with corn syrup, gelatin and some flavouring oils or powders.
LICORICE: The plant Glycyrrhiza glabra, or sometimes in North America the related American Licorice plant Glycyrrhiza lepidota.
LOLLIPOP: An item of confectionery consisting of a piece of candy/sweet attached to a stick.
TOFFEE: A type of confectionery made by boiling sugar (or treacle, etc) with butter or milk, then cooling the mixture so that it becomes hard
